verses.t: From whence{G4159} come wars{G4171} and{G2532} fightings{G3163} among{G1722} you{G5213}? come they not{G3756} hence{G1782}, even of{G1537} your{G5216} lusts{G3588} that war{G4754} in{G1722} your{G5216} members{G3588}?

Ye lust{G1937}, and{G2532} have{G2192} not{G3756}: ye kill{G5407}, and{G2532} desire to have{G2206}, and{G2532} cannot{G1410} obtain{G2013}: ye fight{G3164} and{G2532} war{G4170}, yet{G1161} ye have{G2192} not{G3756}, because{G1223} ye{G5209} ask{G154} not{G3361}.
Ye ask{G154}, and{G2532} receive{G2983} not{G3756}, because{G1360} ye ask{G154} amiss{G2560}, that{G2443} ye may consume{G1159} it upon{G1722} your{G5216} lusts{G3588}.

Ye adulterers{G3432} and{G2532} adulteresses{G3428}, know ye{G1492} not{G3756} that{G3754} the friendship{G3588} of the world{G3588} is{G2076} enmity{G2189} with God{G3588}? whosoever{G3739} therefore{G3767} will{G1014} be{G1511} a friend{G5384} of the world{G3588} is{G2525} the enemy{G2190} of God{G3588}.
Do{G2228} ye think{G1380} that{G3754} the scripture{G3588} saith{G3004} in vain{G2761}, The spirit{G3588} that{G3739} dwelleth{G2730} in{G1722} us{G2254} lusteth{G1971} to{G4314} envy{G5355}?
But{G1161} he giveth{G1325} more{G3173} grace{G5485}. Wherefore{G1352} he saith{G3004}, God{G3588} resisteth{G498} the proud{G5244}, but{G1161} giveth{G1325} grace{G5485} unto the humble{G5011}.
Submit yourselves{G5293} therefore{G3767} to God{G3588}. Resist{G436} the devil{G1228}, and{G2532} he will flee{G5343} from{G575} you{G5216}.

Draw nigh{G1448} to God{G3588}, and{G2532} he will draw nigh{G1448} to you{G5213}. Cleanse{G2511} your hands{G5495}, ye sinners{G268}; and{G2532} purify{G48} your hearts{G2588}, ye double minded{G1374}.

Be afflicted{G5003}, and{G2532} mourn{G3996}, and{G2532} weep{G2799}: let{G3344} your{G5216} laughter{G3588} be turned{G3344} to{G1519} mourning{G3997}, and{G2532} your joy{G3588} to{G1519} heaviness{G2726}.
Humble yourselves{G5013} in the sight of{G1799} the Lord{G3588}, and{G2532} he shall lift{G5312} you{G5209} up{G5312}.

Speak{G2635} not{G3361} evil{G2635} one of another{G240}, brethren{G80}. He that{G3588} speaketh evil{G2635} of{G80} his brother{G80}, and{G2532} judgeth{G2919} his{G846} brother{G3588}, speaketh evil{G2635} of the law{G3551}, and{G2532} judgeth{G2919} the law{G3551}: but{G1161} if{G1487} thou judge{G2919} the law{G3551}, thou art{G1488} not{G3756} a doer{G4163} of the law{G3551}, but{G235} a judge{G2923}.
There is{G2076} one{G1520} lawgiver{G3588}, who{G3588} is able{G1410} to save{G4982} and{G2532} to destroy{G622}: who{G5101} art{G1488} thou{G4771} that{G3739} judgest{G2919} another{G2087}?

Go to{G71} now{G3568}, ye{G3588} that say{G3004}, To day{G4594} or{G2532} to morrow{G839} we will go{G4198} into{G1519} such{G3592} a city{G3588}, and{G2532} continue{G4160} there{G1563} a{G1520} year{G1763}, and{G2532} buy and sell{G1710}, and{G2532} get gain{G2770}:

Whereas{G3748} ye know{G1987} not{G3756} what{G3588} shall be on the morrow{G839}. For{G1063} what{G4169} is your{G5216} life{G3588}? It is{G2076} even{G1063} a vapour{G822}, that appeareth{G5316} for{G4314} a little time{G3641}, and{G1161} then{G1899} vanisheth away{G853}.
For that{G473} ye{G5209} ought to say{G3004}, If{G1437} the Lord{G3588} will{G2309}, we shall live{G2198}, and{G2532} do{G4160} this{G5124}, or{G2228} that{G1565}.
But{G1161} now{G3568} ye rejoice{G2744} in{G1722} your{G5216} boastings{G3588}: all{G3956} such{G5108} rejoicing{G2746} is{G2076} evil{G4190}.
Therefore{G3767} to him that knoweth{G1492} to do{G4160} good{G2570}, and{G2532} doeth{G4160} it not{G3361}, to him{G846} it is{G2076} sin{G266}.
